column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If you are looking for a trendy
column2: hipster place that isn't that intimidating
column3: come here. The decor is simple
column4: but the display of their breads
column7: and macaroons is simply stunning. Luckily we came on a weekday around 12pm and snagged the last parking space in their small parking lot. There was no wait and the person behind the counter patiently waited as we pondered what delectable delights we would be ordering.
